name: Fairy Secrets 1 - Love Story
description:
Fairy Secrets 1- Love story will let you play with real fairy. Every little girl wants to be a princess or looks like a fairy. So girls you have to help this fairy girl to escape from her problems. Let’s cut the ropes around fairy and the make bracelet and fix her glasses. Give a cool spa to fairy by shower, arrange her wings, make her nice shoes and many more. Help the fairy girl to do some shopping from a supermarket shopping store. Help her to draw some amazing paintings. Eat sandwiches and apply some crazy outfits on fairy in a fairy salon.

Fairies are famous for their beauty and charming personality with otherworldly allure. So girls want to dressing like a fairy is a great way to express your creativity and femininity.This fairy fashion love story game will guide about fairy fashion and will teach you how to incorporate fairy flair into ensembles for a beautiful gorgeous look. Understand one thing is that fairies are more than just the wings. Fairies live in and make use of natural world. Fairies wear flowers in their hairs and around necks and wrists. Fairy clothing is old fashioned and romantic. So for modern fairy fashion think about long skirts, lace and ribbons. Usually fairies hairs are natural, so no need to over process it with perms, dyes or straighteners. Fairies glow so take care of skins. Wash, exfoliate and moisturise for healthy glow.Adorn your hairs with ribbons and flowers.

Fairy Secrets 1 - Love story features:

* Boy and girls friends true love story and crush dates
* Romantic fairy secret date in garden, school and fairyland
* Fairy and boy friend offers flowers and bracelets to each others
* Fairy secrets reveal as she is not human but she is fairy girl
* Apply rosy blush to your cheeks to look like fairy girls
* wear long flowy dresses and long skirts for fairy look
* Save the cute fairy for being drown in sea to feel real love
* Fairies are modest, charm and helpful kind to others
* There are fairies which are guardians of nature

Let’s Learn the Fairy Vocabulary:

* Anha means Love & Anhilna means beautiful
* Dane means sing & Elthen means friend
* Enkamenkam means forever and Fey means fairy
* Flien means to fly & Fofobrah means tomorrow
* Halle means hello & Lorinten means Happiness
* Lume means light & Mana means tree
* Mina means flower and Niven means dance
* Shay means joy and hanathen means gladness

Do not forget to play all of our other high school crush for girls, Prom queen date, gymnastic queen, Vampire love story, heartbreaking story, Love story be crazy in Love, ballerina dance, fitness gym workout, ice dancing, dancing school hip hop, skateboard skating girls, horse care and riding and other dress up games for girls and all family.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
